categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Eddon was a male Human Sith Inquisitor who held the rank of Sith Lord during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. He was stationed aboard Vaiken Spacedock.

Lord Eddon appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a PvP gear vendor for the Sith Inquisitor class on Vaiken Spacedock, though he was later removed in a reorganization of the gear system.
